meanings.definition: A person who introduces new methods, ideas, or products.
meanings.sent1: The young innovator created a new app to help students study more efficiently.
meanings.sent2: Steve Jobs was known as a great innovator in the tech industry.
meanings.sent3: The innovator decided to wear a cape to work, claiming it would boost creativity.
meanings.sent4: She was an innovator in the kitchen, always coming up with unique recipes.
meanings.sent5: The innovator's mind was like a treasure trove of endless possibilities.

meanings.definition: A company or organization that introduces new methods, ideas, or products.
meanings.sent1: The tech innovator unveiled their latest product at the conference.
meanings.sent2: Google is considered a leading innovator in the field of technology.
meanings.sent3: The innovator company decided to have a bring-your-pet-to-work day to boost morale.
meanings.sent4: The small startup was an innovator in sustainable packaging solutions.
meanings.sent5: The innovator in the industry set the bar high for competitors.
